sys_script_include.name: AutoPopulate_UserInfo

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_97722d5393572a1005b6367efaba10a6
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1808462_mysdesk.AutoPopulate_UserInfo</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>AutoPopulate_UserInfo</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var AutoPopulate_UserInfo = Class.create();
AutoPopulate_UserInfo.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    getCompanyAndLocation: function() {
        var userId = this.getParameter('sysparm_user'); // requested_for sys_id
        var result = {};

        if (userId) {
            var userGR = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
            if (userGR.get(userId)) {
                // Company
                if (userGR.company)
                    result.company = userGR.company.getDisplayValue();
                else
                    result.company = "";

                // Location
                if (userGR.location)
                    result.location = userGR.location.getDisplayValue();
                else
                    result.location = "";
            }
        }

        return new JSON().encode(result); // return JSON back to client script
    },

    type: 'AutoPopulate_UserInfo'
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-16 19:56:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>97722d5393572a1005b6367efaba10a6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AutoPopulate_UserInfo</sys_name><sys_package display_value="MyServiceDesk" source="x_1808462_mysdesk">bcb2fd1c935ba25005b6367efaba10ed</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="MyServiceDesk">bcb2fd1c935ba25005b6367efaba10ed</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_97722d5393572a1005b6367efaba10a6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-16 19:56:43</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
